column4: Nvidia settles feud with Samsung over graphics patents
column5: May 2 - Graphics chip maker Nvidia Corp announced a settlement of a patent dispute with Samsung Electronics Co Ltd  on Monday  hours before a U.S. trade agency was due to rule on a complaint that could have blocked importation of some of Nvidia's products.

column4: Nvidia settles feud with Samsung over graphics patents
column5: NEW YORK Graphics chip maker Nvidia Corp announced a settlement of a patent dispute with Samsung Electronics Co Ltd on Monday  hours before a U.S. trade agency was due to rule on a complaint that could have blocked importation of some of Nvidia's products.
